meanings.definition: A person who draws or produces maps.
meanings.sent1: The cartographer carefully sketched out the new map of the town.
meanings.sent2: The cartographer used advanced software to create a detailed map of the city.
meanings.sent3: The cartographer accidentally drew a map with all the roads leading to the ice cream shop!
meanings.sent4: The cartographer's mind was a map of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The cartographer's precision in drawing maps was unmatched.

meanings.definition: A person who creates or designs maps.
meanings.sent1: Every explorer relied on the cartographer's expertise to navigate through unknown lands.
meanings.sent2: The cartographer spent hours perfecting the layout of the world map.
meanings.sent3: The cartographer decided to add a hidden treasure map in the corner of the main map.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as a cartographer, mapping out fantastical realms.
meanings.sent5: The cartographer's maps were like windows into different worlds.
